creativemenutweaks.config.title: Mod Config
creativemenutweaks.config.tabSounds.name: Tab Sounds
creativemenutweaks.config.tabSounds.desc: Toggles whether or not when clicking on tabs it produces a click sound.
creativemenutweaks.config.tabPopout.name: Tab Popout
creativemenutweaks.config.tabPopout.desc: Toggles whether or not tabs should pop out when hovering, along with the icon being popped out when selected.
creativemenutweaks.config.tooltipMode.de: This option dictates how tooltips should be positioned when hovering tabs
